mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT RFI.ID, RFI.BUSINESSID, RFI.PROJECTNAME, RFI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RFI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, RFI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RFI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = RFI.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, RFI.CREATE_DATE FROM RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO RFI WHERE RFI.STAGE IN ('6', '9') ) t where 1 = 1 and t.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}

select * from (select (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = f.pertainareaid) pertainareaname, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = f.reportingunit_id) reportunitname, (select i.item_name from sys_dictionary_item i where i.item_code = f.servicetype_id) serviceType, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.UUID = f.createby) createByname, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.UUID = f.reviewpersonid) reviewleader, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.UUID = f.legalreviewpersonid) legalLeader, f.* from rcm_formalassessment_info f where 1=1 ) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.createby = #{createBy} and ta.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%' and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state in (${wf_state}) and ta.pertainAreaId = #{areaId} and ta.servicetype_id in ('${serviceTypeId}') and ta.stage in (${stages})
and ta.apply_date between to_date('${year}/01/01 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${year}/12/31 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ta.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.formal_type = 0 and d.decision_result in ( ${auditResult} ) ) order by ta.need_meeting, ta.stage desc

select * from ( SELECT RPI.ID, RPI.BUSINESSID, RPI.PROJECTNAME, RPI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RPI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, RPI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RPI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = RPI.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, RPI.CREATE_DATE FROM rcm_pre_info RPI WHERE RPI.STAGE IN ('6', '9') ) t where 1 = 1 and t.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}

select * from (SELECT p.ID, p.BUSINESSID, p.PROJECTNAME, p.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = p.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, (select d.item_name from sys_dictionary_item d where d.item_code = p.servicetype_id) serviceTypename, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = p.reportingunit_id) reportuntiname, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = p.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = p.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, p.CREATE_DATE FROM rcm_pre_info p ) ta WHERE 1 = 1 and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state in (${wf_state}) and ta.pertainAreaId = #{areaId} and ta.servicetype_id in ('${serviceTypeId}') and ta.stage in (${stages}) and ta.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.formal_type = 2 and d.decision_result in ( ${auditResult} ) ) order by ta.need_meeting, ta.stage desc

select * from (SELECT p.ID, p.BUSINESSID, p.PROJECTNAME, p.PROJECTNUM, p.stage, p.need_meeting, p.pertainAreaId, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = p.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, (select d.item_name from sys_dictionary_item d where d.item_code = p.servicetype_id) serviceTypename, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = p.reportingunit_id) reportuntiname, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = p.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = p.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, p.CREATE_DATE, p.apply_date FROM rcm_pre_info p ) ta WHERE 1 = 1 and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state in (${wf_state}) and ta.pertainAreaId = #{areaId} and ta.servicetype_id in ('${serviceTypeId}') and ta.stage in (${stages})
and ta.apply_date between to_date('${year}/01/01 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${year}/12/31 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by ta.need_meeting, ta.stage desc
